mapper.insert: insert into cart(checked, quantity, member_id, product_id) VALUE (#{checked}, #{quantity}, #{memberId}, #{productId});
mapper.select: SELECT c.id cartId, c.checked, c.quantity, p.id productId, p.image productImage, p.name productName, p.price productPrice, m.id memberId FROM cart c JOIN member m on m.id = c.member_id JOIN product p on p.id = c.product_id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId}
